Summary: NOT JUST AZ drivin@night &noticed 2my left almost freeway level...there's a slight valley.going east 2wds Redlands CA frm Fullerton.Kept2myslf.Talkd/ friend 2011 about&drew/napkin Friend found it online.it was the SLOW&silent AZ UFO.
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Redlands
There were no other sightings in Redlands on or around June 1st 2003
divs: sighting detailsi was driving home from fullerton area in california on the 60fwy early one morning around 3am. i was going eastward.i had just cleared a treeline and after a moment i realized that the valley that was usually bright-ish at nite wasn't as bright as it normally was. i looked left and wondered at the differences. i had never really studied the valley but it looked wrong...like there was a strip all the way across the valley blocking the city lights... i saw these reddish orange lights spreading almost from the freeway all the way to the other side. it almost seemed level with the freeway and maybe a bit below. it was like the only sound i could hear was the sound of my automobile. i checked my digital when i first recognized i was looking at some wierd silent very slow moving flying object. i looked at the digital clock afterwards too to make sure i didn't "loose time". unfortunately i don't remember the exact time; just that it was just a few minutes after i had checked it. (so no loss of time) when i first saw it it was so big it took me awhile to recognize that it was all attached and moving together. i didn't know what i was looking at until i started to actually looked at the row of lights that seemed like they were all in a row spreading from me strait across... then i started looking at what the lights were attached to. it was dark in color and boomerang like; metalic. it seemed so silent and so huge!!! then i moved to las vegas in october 2003. i was talking to one of my friends\rmmt about this object last year; 2011. i drew a picture on a napkin and showed him. he went online and then after about half and hour called me back into the room and showed me this thing that apparently was on tv and i said, "oh my god! that's it!". he was showing me the "arizona lights". of course this totally was like wow and i saw it in california. i've always thought there was life far more advanced than us and that night cemented my belief. i lost site of it only because i was so tired and really needed sleep and just kept driving towards redlands near sanberdo. don't think the tv showed it from my perspective; the end of the wing tip...and it seemed to be one single curved wing...
